title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8145.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8145.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 414
between the Thruway, Exit 41, and Routes 5 and 20 in the Towns of Tyre and

Seneca Falls. (b) Route 5/US Route
20. Route 5/US Route 20 between the Ontario/Seneca county line and the

Seneca/Cayuga county line. (c) Route 96A between Route 5/US Route 20 and Route 96. (d) Route 414 between the New York State

Thruway and the Wayne county line in the Towns of Tyre and Junius. (e) [Eff. until Sept. 28, 1988, see also
subd. (e) below.] Route 5. Route 5
between the Cayuga-Seneca county line and Route 318 in the Town of Tyre and the

Town of Seneca Falls. (e) [Eff. Sept. 28, 1988 until June 22, 1994, see also subd. (e) above and below.] Route 5. Route 5
between the Cayuga-Seneca county line and the Guaranteed Parts Co., shipping
terminal approximately 0.75 mile west of the Route 5-Route 318 intersection in
the Towns of Tyre and Seneca Falls. (e) [Eff. June 22, 1994, see also
subd. (e) above.]
[Repealed]
(f) Route 318. Route 318
between the Seneca-Ontario county line and Route 5 in the Town of Tyre and Town
of Junius. (g) [Eff. until June 22, 1994, see also subd. (g) below.]
Route 5, US Route 20 and Route 414. Route 5, US Route 20 and Route 414 between

Route 414 (westerly end of overlap) and Route 5, Ovid Street (easterly end of
overlap) in the Town of Seneca Falls and the Village of Seneca Falls. (g) [Eff. June 22, 1994, see also
subd. (g) above.]
[Repealed]
(h) East Bayard Street. East Bayard Street between Route 414 and Gould's Pump Inc., facility, a
distance of 1.5+- miles in the Town of Seneca Falls and Village of Seneca

Falls. (i) Route 336. Route 336
between Route 96A and Route 96 in the Towns of Fayette and Varick. (j) Route 96. Route 96 between Route 336 and

Seneca Army Depot entrance in the Towns of Varick and Romulus. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8145.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
